Web Accessibility

Westamerica is committed to providing outstanding service to all of our clients, including those with disabilities. We want all of our website visitors to have a positive experience and to benefit from our online services. For the best experience, please use the most current versions of your web browser, assistive technology and our mobile banking apps.

The Westamerica Bank website is monitored and tested regularly by internal resources and through browser plug-ins which provide Web Accessibility testing and monitoring. The certification process involves automatic and manual testing with the goal of meeting Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0 Level AA Standards. Westamerica Bank’s website contains links to websites hosted by third parties. We do not make representations with regard to the accessibility of third-party websites and are not able to correct accessibility barriers on these websites.

If you encounter any type of accessibility barrier on the site, please contact our Customer Service Department at (800) 848-1088.
